description:
A simple app to help miniature painters keep track of their painting recipes

A painting app for mini painters using a phone.

It helps you keep a list of your different paint recipes, with photos of your miniatures, and track the evolution of your minis over time.

Supports paints from Citadel, with more brands to come.

Features

  • Add miniatures and their paint details
  • Keep a photo log of your miniatureâ€™s progress
  • Add your paint recipes directly onto photos of your mini
  • Customize paint application, dilution, and create custom mixes
  • Fully offline with a local database
